alert.note: Alert for Lipscomb; Ochiltree (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 11:31PM CDT until May 31 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Beaver County in the Panhandle of Oklahoma... Northwestern Lipscomb County in the Panhandle of Texas... Central Ochiltree County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1230 AM CDT. * At 1130 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Forgan to 7 miles southeast of Adams, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Perryton, Lipscomb, Beaver, Booker, Forgan, Follett, Darrouzett, Gate, Knowles, Wolf Creek Park, Elmwood, Boyd, Floris, Bryans Corner, Mocane, Slapout and Balko. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
